solution_line_template: Each trip, they add Caleb's {caleb_gallons} gallons + Cynthia's {cynthia_gallons} gallons = <<{caleb_gallons}+{cynthia_gallons}={gallons_per_trip}>>{gallons_per_trip} gallons.

Since they are adding {gallons_per_trip} gallons every trip, to fill the {total_gallons_needed}-gallon pool, it would take {total_gallons_needed} / {gallons_per_trip} = <<{total_gallons_needed}/{gallons_per_trip}={number_of_trips}>>{number_of_trips} trips.
